messages.title: A record of action, a promise of more
messages.content: Helen is a passionate supporter of our NHS and has been at the forefront of campaigns to save King's College Hospital's critical services.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Helen is opposed to the Conservative underfunding and will fight for our health services.
Against Conservative plans to force all state schools to become academies.
Pushing for more genuinely affordable homes and action against rogue landlords.

issues.education: Opposes Conservative plans to force all state schools to become academies and is supporting parents and teachers to prevent this.
issues.health: Helen is a passionate supporter of our NHS and will continue her work to ensure it receives the funding it needs.

housing.content: Helen is working for more genuinely affordable homes, for secure tenancies for private renters, and action against rogue landlords.

leaflet.personalStatement: I have been standing up for our community since being elected in 2015, working tirelessly to ensure your voice is heard in Parliament.

politicalExperience.achievements: Standing up for our community in Parliament and working tirelessly to ensure your voice is heard.

contactInformation.address: Labour Party candidate for Dulwich and West Norwood, PO Box 47629, SW2 1ZZ

leaflet.additionalNotes: Vote Labour in your council on Thursday 8 June, and remember to cast both your votes for Labour!
